text: Beauty is developing into a broader wellness category. People are becoming mindful of how what is manifest externally has a lot to do with what happens internally.

Mia Collins,
general merchandise, manager of beauty, Harrods
The future of wellness is defined less and less by “treatment rooms and locker rooms” and more about culture, community and connection.

Building on a foundation of British luxury,
create a multi-platform, wellness brand and
business model that integrates happy & healthy
living into the everyday voyage.

Cunard’s brand of British Luxury (refined, thoughtful, charismatic, proud) reconnects guests to a time and place of rich heritage and stories, of adventure and grand gestures, reflecting all that is wonderful and special of being British. How do we bring this forward in wellness?
